DOC.brief_summary: This study is a Post-Marketing Surveillance study in Korea to evaluate the safety and efficacy of botulinum toxin Type A to treat Chronic Migraine in clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Botulinum Toxin Type A (BOTOXÂ®) to Treat Chronic Migraine in Korea
DOC.criteria: Patients treated with botulinum toxin Type A for chronic migraine in clinical practice.
